## Installation for development

```shell
uv sync
uv run pip install -e .
```

### Prerequisites  
- Python 3.9 (organised automatically by ```uv```)

Install with ```uv``` (recomended):
```shell
uv add lhcb-rex
```

Install with ```pip```:
```shell
pip install lhcb-rex
```
